text: The Bosnia and Herzegovina women's national basketball team represents Bosnia and Herzegovina in international women's basketball competitions. ==Competitive record== For the results before 1992 see Yugoslavia women's national basketball team. ===Olympic Games=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |- !Year !Round !Position ! ! ! |- | 1992||colspan="5" rowspan="7"|Did not qualify |- | 1996 |- | 2000 |- | 2004 |- | 2008 |- | 2012 |- | 2016 |- |colspan=1|Total||0 Titles||0||0||0||0 |} ===World Championship=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |- !Year !Round !Position ! ! ! |- | 1994||colspan="5" rowspan="7"| Did not qualify |- | 1998 |- | 2002 |- | 2006 |- | 2010 |- | 2014 |- | 2018 |- |colspan=1|Total||0 Titles||0||0||0||0 |} ===EuroBasket=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |- !Year !Round !Position ! ! ! |- | 1993||colspan=5 rowspan="2"| Wasn't allowed to compete |- | 1995 |- | 1997||Preliminary round||12th||7||2||5 |- | 1999||Preliminary round||10th||7||1||6 |- | 2001||colspan="5" rowspan="6"| Did not qualify |- | 2003 |- | 2005 |- | 2007 |- | 2009 |- | 2011 |- | 2013||colspan="5" rowspan="2"| Did not enter |- | 2015 |- | 2017||colspan=5 rowspan="2"|Did not qualify |- |- | 2019 |- | 2021||colspan=5" | To be determined |- |colspan=1|Total||0 Titles||2/10||14||3||11 |} ===Mediterranean Games=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |- !Year !Round !Position |-bgcolor=Gold | 1993||First Place||1st |- | 1997||colspan="2" rowspan="4"| Did not participate |- | 2001 |- | 2005 |- | 2009 |- | 2013 ||colspan=2|Cancelled |- | 2017||colspan="2"| To be determined |- |Total||1 Title||Gold medal |} ==Current Roster== Squad called up for EuroBasket Women 2021 qualification. |} |valign="top" | ;Head coach * ;Assistant coach * |} ===Depth chart=== ==References== ==External links== *Basketball Federation of Bosnia and Herzegovina (Official Website) Category:Women's national basketball teams
